articles.author: STAN CHOE
articles.title: Stock market today: Wall Street steadies itself a day after a sell-off for Nvidia and tech stocks - The Associated Press
articles.description: Nvidia and other U.S. tech stocks are holding a bit steadier after tumbling the day before on doubts about whether the artificial-intelligence frenzy really needs all the dollars being poured into it. The S&P 500 rose 0.3% Tuesday. The Dow Jones Industrial Av…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Nvidia and other U.S. tech stocks are holding a bit steadier Tuesday, a day after tumbling on doubts about whether the artificial-intelligence frenzy really needs all the dollars being … [+4013 chars]
